gov.nih.nci.cbiit.cmts.ui.jgraph
Class MiddlePanelMarqueeHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.jgraph.graph.BasicMarqueeHandler
      gov.nih.nci.cbiit.cmts.ui.jgraph.MiddlePanelMarqueeHandler

public class MiddlePanelMarqueeHandler
extends org.jgraph.graph.BasicMarqueeHandler

This marquee handler overrides basic functionalities provided by basic Marquee handler to plug in customized handlings of key and mouse driven events. The MiddlePanelJGraphController class will deal with real implementation of some of those actions and mainly focuses on drag-and-drop and handlings of repaint of graph, for example.

Since:
CMTS v1.0
